required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Pilot Study of RISE for Nurse Managers
clinical_study.official_title: A Pilot Study of RISE (Resilience, Insight, Self-Compassion, Empowerment) for Nurse Managers

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to determine whether RISE for Nurse Managers has a significant impact on nurse managers' post-traumatic growth, resilience, insight, self-compassion, and empowerment, as well as mental well-being, in their personal lives and their working environment.

primary_outcome.description: 21 item questionnaire with a scale of 0-5, with 0 meaning I did not experience this change as a result of my crisis to 5 meaning I experienced this change to a very great degree as a result of my crisis

secondary_outcome.description: 28 item questionnaire with a scale of 1-4, with 1 meaning I haven't been doing this at all; and 4 meaning I've been doing this a lot

secondary_outcome.measure: Brief Index of Affective Job Satisfaction
secondary_outcome.description: 4 item questionnaire with a scale of 1-5, with 1 meaning strongly disagree; and 5 meaning strongly agree
6 item questionnaire with a scale of 1-5, with 1 meaning strongly disagree; and 5 meaning strongly agree
12 item questionnaire with a scale of A-G, with A meaning very strongly disagree; and G meaning very strongly agree
10 item questionnaire with a scale of 0-4, with 0 meaning never; and 4 meaning very often
16 item questionnaire with a scale of 0-6 with 0 meaning never; and 6 meaning everyday
12 item questionnaire with a scale of 1-5, with 1 meaning almost never; and 5 meaning almost always
20 item questionnaire with a scale of 1-6; with 1 meaning strongly disagree; and 6 meaning strongly agree

arm_group.description: nine 90-minute weekly psychoeducational group sessions facilitated by a licensed mental health counselor (LMHC).

intervention.description: nine 90-minute weekly psychoeducational group sessions facilitated by a licensed mental health counselor (LMHC).

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
1. Adult ≥ 18 years old
2. Licensed as an RN
3. Nurse manager employed by AdventHealth in a hospital-based setting at the Altamonte Springs, Apopka, Carrollwood, Celebration, Connerton, Dade City, Daytona Beach, DeLand, East Orlando, Fish Memorial, Heart of Florida, Kissimmee, Lake Placid, Lake Wales, New Smyrna Beach, North Pinellas, Ocala, Orlando, Palm Coast, Sebring, Tampa, Waterman, Wauchula, Wesley Chapel, Winter Garden, Winter Park, or Zephyrhills campus
4. Able to speak, read, and understand English fluently
5. Able to provide informed consent
6. Willing and able to comply with all study procedures and requirements for the duration of the study
Exclusion Criteria:
1. Employed as a direct care nurse or in another level of nursing leadership (i.e., assistant nurse manager, director of nursing, executive leader)
